Articles.Content:
From click to ready I can get KSP og loaded in about 90 sec, however, when I am exiting it can take as long as 5 - 6 min to get to desktop.

during the 5-6 min I can hear the HD working hard and the cooling fan ramps up in the last 2 min until exit.

can anyone enlighten me as to the workings on the back end to maybe figure out what is making the system struggle to exit?

note: this problem can be completely avoided by just using alt+f4........it so far hasn't caused any problems.
I have no advice but I can move your question to the support sub where someone else might. Good luck and welcome to the forum.
Run a few system audits when you close the program. I am not very tech savvy but my GPU software and AMD settings manager i use both have a feature to log all hardware & processes.
